def RSYNC ( FROM_LOCATION, TO_LOCATION ): from CHROMOSOMES import RSYNC_LOCATION print (f'RSYNCING FROM "{ FROM_LOCATION }" TO "{ TO_LOCATION }"') ''' --archive, -a archive mode is -rlptgoD (no -A,-X,-U,-N,-H) --verbose, -v increase verbosity ''' SCRIPT = f'{ RSYNC_LOCATION } --progress --delete -av "{ FROM_LOCATION }/" "{ TO_LOCATION }"'; PERFORM ( SCRIPT, SCRIPT_ONLY = False ); return;
